title: Crew Show! (Driving the Polestar 1, and Ferrari F8, building updates)
description:
The guys talk about the Polestar 1 and Ferrari F8 that Matt has been driving, we finally started building out the new studio (with help from @latenightplayset), and we talk about the future of Aston Martin. 

 

Follow us!

T: @thesmokingtire @zackklapman

IG: @thesmokingtire @fakezackklapman

 

 

Watch the show: https://youtu.be/5dR5pmk-k5E
author: matt@thesmokingtire.com (Matt Farah & Zack Klapman)
